sqlMap.select: /* userPreference.value */ SELECT value FROM USER_PREFERENCE WHERE USER_ID=#userId# AND DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) AND SYSTEM_CODE=#systemCode# AND NAME=#name#

/* userPreference.detail */ SELECT USER_ID, DOMAIN_ID, SYSTEM_CODE, NAME, VALUE FROM USER_PREFERENCE WHERE USER_ID=#userId# AND DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) AND SYSTEM_CODE=#systemCode# AND NAME=#name#
sqlMap.update: /* userPreference.insert */ INSERT INTO USER_PREFERENCE ( USER_ID, DOMAIN_ID, SYSTEM_CODE, NAME, VALUE) VALUES ( #userId#, CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER), #systemCode#, #name#, #value#)
/* userPreference.update */ UPDATE USER_PREFERENCE SET VALUE = #value# WHERE USER_ID=#userId# AND DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) AND SYSTEM_CODE=#systemCode# AND NAME=#name#
/* userPreference.delete */ DELETE FROM USER_PREFERENCE WHERE USER_ID=#userId# AND DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) AND SYSTEM_CODE=#systemCode# AND NAME=#name#
